sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A comfortable ayde for scholers full of varietie of sentences, gathered out of an Italian authour, by Dauid Rowland. Specchio della lingua latina. Book 1-2. English Grifoni, Giovanni Andrea. Rowland, David, fl. 1569-1586. aut
[24], 140, [2] p.
By Henry Wykes, Imprinted at London : Anno Domini 1568.
Pages 136-37 and 140 misnumbered 138-39 and 141. A translation, by David Rowland, of: Grifoni, Giovanni Andrea. Specchio della lingua latina, books 1-2. Errata on verso of K8, final leaf. Print faded and show-through, illegible in places; some leaves torn. Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
=======

[24], 140, [2] p.
By Henry Wykes, Imprinted at London : Anno Domini 1568.
Pages 136-37 and 140 misnumbered 138-39 and 141. A translation, by David Rowland, of: Grifoni, Giovanni Andrea. Specchio della lingua latina, books 1-2. Errata on verso of K8, final leaf. Print faded and show-through, illegible in places; some leaves torn. Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
